com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components

Class RailTrackerGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components.RailTracker
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components.RailTrackerGroup

  • public class RailTrackerGroup
extends RailTracker
    Uses a track iterator to keep track of the rails a train is driving on. This information is then used to update minecart rails information, handle the detection of signs, update minecart movement directions and detect splitting of trains

      • getRailInformation

        public java.util.List<RailTracker.TrackedRail> getRailInformation()
        Gets a list of all rails blocks that the train occupies. Each item contains information about the rails and the minecart that is 'on' it.
        Returns:
        List of rails block information
